/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the red bus that dominates the right side of the frame. The bus, with its vibrant color, stands out against the more muted tones of the surroundings. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the perspective. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the scene.
